Commands.Rapid Bullets: 2-hit ranged BRV attackHigh turn rateSelf: 3 turns MAX BRV Up II
Commands.Rapid Bullets+: Ranged BRV attack + HP attack.Self: 3 turns MAX BRV Up II.High turn rate
Commands.Reload: Resets use count of other abilitiesSelf: Increases BRV based on ATK; 6 turns Trigger-HappyRapid Bullets becomes Rapid Bullets+ (ranged BRV attack + HP attack) while Trigger-Happy is active

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.Mighty Rapid Bullets: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Rapid Bullets by 10%.
Artifacts.Bravery Reload: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Reload.

Passives.Ability Attack High: Slightly raises BRV damage when using abilities continuously.
Passives.Rapid Bullets Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Rapid Bullets.
Passives.Critical Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after inflicting a critical hit.
Passives.Start Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 3 turns when the battle starts.
Passives.Reload BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using Reload.
Passives.Leg Shot: Grants a low probability of inflicting a Small Speed Down debuff for 3 turns after a BRV Attack.
Passives.Rapid Bullets Charge: Increases the max uses of Rapid Bullets by 1.
Passives.Reload Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Reload.
Passives.Never Give Up: Prevents Break status if BRV is over 50%.BRV value remains at 1.

Weapons.Judgment CP: 15: Increases the potency of Rapid Bullets.Grants Small Attack Up for 1 turn.
Weapons.Outsider CP: 35: Increases Reload's max uses by 1.Raises its BRV gain and lowers its action delay.Improves the effects of Trigger Happy and extends its duration.
